# TypeScript Instructions

> This is a reference file for GitHub Copilot.
> The authoritative version is maintained at `.ai/standards/code/typescript.md`

## Quick Rules

- **Strict mode:** Always enabled
- **Type safety:** No `any` types
- **Naming:** camelCase for variables/functions, PascalCase for types/classes

## Full Standards

For complete TypeScript coding standards, see:
- **Primary source:** [.ai/standards/code/typescript.md](../../.ai/standards/code/typescript.md)

Apply these standards to all TypeScript code in this project.

---

**Note:** This file exists for GitHub Copilot compatibility. All updates should be made to `.ai/standards/code/typescript.md` which is the single source of truth.
